translations: n.（拉丁）迫切需要得到之物（desideratum 的复数）

phrs.translation: 迫切需要物, 迫切需要的东西, 急需东西, 唱片名

sentences.sentence: The film ends, as it begins with a recitation of the Desiderata.
sentences.translation: 影片结束，因为它德赛德拉塔始于一朗诵的。

sentences.sentence: The sample solution completely fulfills the four desiderata I listed at the beginning of this article
sentences.translation: 这个示例解决方案完全满足我在本文开始时列出的四项要求

sentences.sentence: Of course, the two have seldom been more closely linked, health, diet and safety having replaced faith, hope and charity as the desiderata of the virtuous life.
sentences.translation: 诚然，品行与身体状况两者基本没什么紧密联系。信仰、希望和慈善已经取代了健康、饮食和安全，成为高尚生活的急需品。
